activity: Open your Gramática de uso del español book to your current unit. Complete one page of exercises (práctica).
done_condition: when you finish one page of exercises

activity: Open your Gramática book to the next unread unit. Read just the teoría section (grammar explanation). Don't do exercises yet.
done_condition: when you've read the full teoría section of one unit

activity: Flip back 5-10 units in your Gramática book. Redo 5 random exercises from units you've already completed. Check your answers.
done_condition: when you've redone and checked 5 exercises

activity: Open your Gramática book. Complete two full pages of exercises from your current unit.
done_condition: when you finish two pages of exercises

activity: Look around you. Name 10 objects in Spanish. If you don't know a word, look it up and write it down.
done_condition: when you've named 10 objects (looking up unknowns)

activity: Pick a topic related to what you're working on. Look up and write down 5 Spanish words you don't know related to that topic.
done_condition: when you've written 5 new words with definitions

activity: Open your flashcard app (Anki, Quizlet, etc.) or physical cards. Review 10 Spanish vocabulary cards.
done_condition: when you've reviewed 10 cards

activity: Open your flashcard app or physical cards. Review 25 Spanish vocabulary cards. Mark any you struggle with for extra review.
done_condition: when you've reviewed 25 cards

activity: Watch 5 minutes of Dreaming Spanish (YouTube) at Beginner or Intermediate level. No subtitles—just listen and watch.
done_condition: when you've watched for 5 minutes

activity: Watch 10 minutes of Dreaming Spanish (YouTube) at Intermediate level. No subtitles—just comprehensible input.
done_condition: when you've watched for 10 minutes

activity: Listen to one segment of News in Slow Spanish (podcast or website). Focus on understanding the gist, not every word.
done_condition: when the segment ends

activity: Listen to a Spanish song you like. Look up the lyrics. Read along while listening a second time.
done_condition: when you've listened twice (once without, once with lyrics)

activity: Read one short article on a Spanish news site (BBC Mundo, El País, etc.). Underline 3 words you don't know and look them up.
done_condition: when you've read the article and looked up 3 words

activity: Open Instagram and read 5 posts from Spanish-language accounts you follow (or find some: @haborla, @spanishwithpablo, @español.con.mar).
done_condition: when you've read 5 posts in Spanish

activity: Write 3 sentences in Spanish describing what you're doing right now. Use present tense. Check with a translator if unsure.
done_condition: when you've written 3 sentences

activity: Write a short paragraph (4-5 sentences) about what you did yesterday. Use past tenses (pretérito/imperfecto).
done_condition: when you've written 4-5 sentences about yesterday

activity: Write 5 sentences describing the room you're in. Use hay, está/están, ser, prepositions. Include colors and locations.
done_condition: when you've written 5 descriptive sentences

activity: Out loud, describe in Spanish what you're working on right now. Speak for at least 1 minute. Don't worry about mistakes.
done_condition: when you've spoken for 1+ minute about your work

activity: Play a Spanish podcast or video. Shadow the speaker—repeat what they say immediately after, mimicking rhythm and pronunciation.
done_condition: when you've shadowed for 3+ minutes

activity: Count from 1-100 in Spanish out loud. Then narrate 3 things you see (Veo una..., Hay un/una..., etc.).
done_condition: when you've counted to 100 and described 3 things

activity: Open Pimsleur app. Do 10 minutes of your current lesson (or start a new one). Speak out loud—don't just listen.
done_condition: when you've done 10 minutes of active Pimsleur practice

activity: Open Pimsleur app. Do a Quick Review or Speed Round of a recent lesson.
done_condition: when you complete the review session

activity: Open ChatGPT (or this chat). Have a 5-turn conversation in Spanish about your day. Ask it to correct your mistakes.
done_condition: when you've exchanged 5 messages in Spanish

activity: Pick one verb (hablar, comer, vivir, or irregular like ser, ir, tener). Write out all 6 present tense conjugations, then all 6 preterite.
done_condition: when you've written 12 conjugations (6 present + 6 preterite)

activity: Write 5 sentences using SER and 5 sentences using ESTAR. Make sure you understand why each requires that verb.
done_condition: when you've written 10 sentences total (5 ser, 5 estar)
